name: PLATZKART
description:
This is not quite a game in the usual sense.
It so happened that everything that has a program code and 3D graphics is called games.
We prefer to call this project something like a digital dream.
For the buyer, including in order not to be disappointed, it is important to understand that there is no "game" here. This is a piece of a dream, and even if it is packed in machine code, it is not a game



The project pays tribute to the post-Soviet culture and captures the memories of our generation, for us in the future, giving an opportunity to plunge into the past. In 20 years, there will be no such trains, and as long as there are people who can reproduce some fragment of the life of a generation, we need to take time and preserve it.




Features:

-Travel in train through Syberia. Lie on a bed immersively, sit at the table. Listen to the sound of wheels. Hear drunk men singing, people talking and snoring.

-Just hide in a virtual blanket and look out the window at the falling snow and beautiful winter landscapes. Drink some tea while listening to post-hardcore, and just immerse into the atmosphere.

-Learn what's like in russian trains

-Beautiful graphics

-First person view

-Supports VR

-Gamepad support

-Achievements
